name: Morpeko
author: kodama
flavor_text: It has a small stomach. If it isn’t constantly eating the seeds it keeps in its pockets, it will get hungry immediately.

abilities.name: Snack Seek
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may look at the top card of your deck. You may discard that card.

attacks.name: Pick and Stick
attacks.effect: Attach up to 2 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like.
